title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
EB: At the moment the working set is deleted, the package view in the background should not immediately refilter. The refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not during the process of manipulating the working set. Additionally, pressing 'cancel' should cancel any changes made to the working sets, including the removal of a working set.
